name: Bounce but BETTER
description:
This was originally meant to be an upgraded version of my game Bounce for mobile but then I realised it would cost $25. So instead I forgot about until I remembered it and spent an hour turning it into a pc release.

NEW FEATURES

  • Varying box sizes
  • Potential 4th box
  • Screen Shake
  • Bad Music
  • Start Menu
  • Functioning exit button
  • Bad particles
  • Skins
  • Levels
  • High score saver
  • New glitches
